runningSession.feedbackChannel.info: The Feedback-Channel allows you to get open feedback from your participants. If you publish the feedbacks, your participants will be able to see what other participants have already posted.

form.createSession.participantAuth.passw: After your upload of a list of arbitrary usernames/pseudonyms, we generate a list of username-password combinations that you can distribute to your participants.
form.createSession.participantAuth.switc: After your upload of a list of SwitchAAI accounts (exact matches by email), participants will get access to your KlickerUZH session using their personal SwitchAAI login. Therefore, you will not be able to emulate any of your participants.
form.createSession.participantAuth.compl: The results of a session will be stored in a way that makes accessible individual participant responses and the corresponding username.
form.createSession.participantAuth.aggre: The results of a session will only be stored in an aggregated format, making it impossible to derive the responses of individual participants.
form.createSession.participantAuth.strin: Input your participants (each on a new line)
form.userSettings.string.accountDeletion: All your data will be removed from the Klicker servers. We will not be able to recover any of your data, should you find that you would still have needed it.
To request deletion of your Klicker account, please click the button below. You will be sent an email that will allow you to confirm your account deletion.
form.userSettings.button.successfulReque: We have sent you an email regarding your account deletion request. Please check your inbox in a few minutes.
form.userSettings.button.requestAccountD: Yes, I want to delete my account!
